10namespace v8 {
11namespace internal {
12
13template <typename Trait>
14double MemoryController<Trait>::GrowingFactor(Heap* heap, size_t max_heap_size,
15 double gc_speed,
16 double mutator_speed) {
17 const double max_factor = MaxGrowingFactor(max_heap_size);
18 const double factor =
19 DynamicGrowingFactor(gc_speed, mutator_speed, max_factor);
20 if (v8_flags.trace_gc_verbose) {
21 Isolate::FromHeap(heap)->PrintWithTimestamp(
22 "[%s] factor %.1f based on mu=%.3f, speed_ratio=%.f "
23 "(gc=%.f, mutator=%.f)\n",
24 Trait::kName, factor, Trait::kTargetMutatorUtilization,
25 gc_speed / mutator_speed, gc_speed, mutator_speed);
26 }
27 return factor;
28}
29
30template <typename Trait>
31double MemoryController<Trait>::MaxGrowingFactor(size_t max_heap_size) {
32 constexpr double kMinSmallFactor = 1.3;
33 constexpr double kMaxSmallFactor = 2.0;
34 constexpr double kHighFactor = 4.0;
35
36 // If we are on a device with lots of memory, we allow a high heap
37 // growing factor.
38 if (max_heap_size >= Trait::kMaxSize) {
39 return kHighFactor;
40 }
41
42 size_t max_size = std::max({max_heap_size, Trait::kMinSize});
43
44 DCHECK_GE(max_size, Trait::kMinSize);
45 DCHECK_LT(max_size, Trait::kMaxSize);
46
47 // On smaller devices we linearly scale the factor: C+(D-C)*(X-A)/(B-A)
48 double factor = kMinSmallFactor + (kMaxSmallFactor - kMinSmallFactor) *
49 (max_size - Trait::kMinSize) /
50 (Trait::kMaxSize - Trait::kMinSize);
51 return factor;
52}
53
54// Given GC speed in bytes per ms, the allocation throughput in bytes per ms
55// (mutator speed), this function returns the heap growing factor that will
56// achieve the target_mutator_utilization_ if the GC speed and the mutator speed
57// remain the same until the next GC.
58//
59// For a fixed time-frame T = TM + TG, the mutator utilization is the ratio
60// TM / (TM + TG), where TM is the time spent in the mutator and TG is the
61// time spent in the garbage collector.
62//
63// Let MU be target_mutator_utilization_, the desired mutator utilization for
64// the time-frame from the end of the current GC to the end of the next GC.
65// Based on the MU we can compute the heap growing factor F as
66//
67// F = R * (1 - MU) / (R * (1 - MU) - MU), where R = gc_speed / mutator_speed.
68//
69// This formula can be derived as follows.
70//
71// F = Limit / Live by definition, where the Limit is the allocation limit,
72// and the Live is size of live objects.
73// Let’s assume that we already know the Limit. Then:
74// TG = Limit / gc_speed
75// TM = (TM + TG) * MU, by definition of MU.
76// TM = TG * MU / (1 - MU)
77// TM = Limit * MU / (gc_speed * (1 - MU))
78// On the other hand, if the allocation throughput remains constant:
79// Limit = Live + TM * allocation_throughput = Live + TM * mutator_speed
80// Solving it for TM, we get
81// TM = (Limit - Live) / mutator_speed
82// Combining the two equation for TM:
83// (Limit - Live) / mutator_speed = Limit * MU / (gc_speed * (1 - MU))
84// (Limit - Live) = Limit * MU * mutator_speed / (gc_speed * (1 - MU))
85// substitute R = gc_speed / mutator_speed
86// (Limit - Live) = Limit * MU / (R * (1 - MU))
87// substitute F = Limit / Live
88// F - 1 = F * MU / (R * (1 - MU))
89// F - F * MU / (R * (1 - MU)) = 1
90// F * (1 - MU / (R * (1 - MU))) = 1
91// F * (R * (1 - MU) - MU) / (R * (1 - MU)) = 1
92// F = R * (1 - MU) / (R * (1 - MU) - MU)
93template <typename Trait>
94double MemoryController<Trait>::DynamicGrowingFactor(double gc_speed,
95 double mutator_speed,
96 double max_factor) {
97 DCHECK_LE(Trait::kMinGrowingFactor, max_factor);
98 DCHECK_GE(Trait::kMaxGrowingFactor, max_factor);
99 if (gc_speed == 0 || mutator_speed == 0) return max_factor;
100
101 const double speed_ratio = gc_speed / mutator_speed;
102
103 const double a = speed_ratio * (1 - Trait::kTargetMutatorUtilization);
104 const double b = speed_ratio * (1 - Trait::kTargetMutatorUtilization) -
105 Trait::kTargetMutatorUtilization;
106
107 // The factor is a / b, but we need to check for small b first.
108 double factor = (a < b * max_factor) ? a / b : max_factor;
109 DCHECK_LE(factor, max_factor);
110 factor = std::max({factor, Trait::kMinGrowingFactor});
111 return factor;
112}
113
114template <typename Trait>
115size_t MemoryController<Trait>::MinimumAllocationLimitGrowingStep(
116 Heap::HeapGrowingMode growing_mode) {
117 const size_t kRegularAllocationLimitGrowingStep = 8;
118 const size_t kLowMemoryAllocationLimitGrowingStep = 2;
119 size_t limit = (PageMetadata::kPageSize > MB ? PageMetadata::kPageSize : MB);
120 return limit * (growing_mode == Heap::HeapGrowingMode::kConservative
121 ? kLowMemoryAllocationLimitGrowingStep
122 : kRegularAllocationLimitGrowingStep);
123}
124
125template <typename Trait>
126size_t MemoryController<Trait>::CalculateAllocationLimit(
127 Heap* heap, size_t current_size, size_t min_size, size_t max_size,
128 size_t new_space_capacity, double factor,
129 Heap::HeapGrowingMode growing_mode) {
130 switch (growing_mode) {
131 case Heap::HeapGrowingMode::kConservative:
132 case Heap::HeapGrowingMode::kSlow:
133 factor = std::min({factor, Trait::kConservativeGrowingFactor});
134 break;
135 case Heap::HeapGrowingMode::kMinimal:
136 factor = Trait::kMinGrowingFactor;
137 break;
138 case Heap::HeapGrowingMode::kDefault:
139 break;
140 }
141
142 if (v8_flags.heap_growing_percent > 0) {
143 factor = 1.0 + v8_flags.heap_growing_percent / 100.0;
144 }
145
146 CHECK_LT(1.0, factor);
147 CHECK_LT(0, current_size);
148 const uint64_t limit =
149 std::max(static_cast<uint64_t>(current_size * factor),
150 static_cast<uint64_t>(current_size) +
151 MinimumAllocationLimitGrowingStep(growing_mode)) +
152 new_space_capacity;
153 const uint64_t halfway_to_the_max =
154 (static_cast<uint64_t>(current_size) + max_size) / 2;
155 const uint64_t limit_or_halfway =
156 std::min<uint64_t>(limit, halfway_to_the_max);
157 const size_t result =
158 static_cast<size_t>(std::max<uint64_t>(limit_or_halfway, min_size));
159 if (v8_flags.trace_gc_verbose) {
160 Isolate::FromHeap(heap)->PrintWithTimestamp(
161 "[%s] Limit: old size: %zu KB, new limit: %zu KB (%.1f)\n",
162 Trait::kName, current_size / KB, result / KB, factor);
163 }
164 return result;
165}
166
167template class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE MemoryController<V8HeapTrait>;
168template class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE MemoryController<GlobalMemoryTrait>;
169
170const char* V8HeapTrait::kName = "HeapController";
171const char* GlobalMemoryTrait::kName = "GlobalMemoryController";
